artist: Artist: Sabrina Jones , et al.; Author: Eric Drooker , et al.; Editor: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of a tree's branches growing into hands amongst a cityscape, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 96 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #15
